text: Rodney Bewes (27 November 1937 – 21 November 2017) was an English television actor and writer. He was best known for playing Bob Ferris in the BBC television sitcom The Likely Lads (1964–66) and in its sequel Whatever Happened to the Likely Lads? (1973–74). Bewes died a week before his 80th birthday on 21 November 2017 in Manchester of vascular dementia. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Feature from Wales on Sunday, archived by The Free Library * Daily Mail article from 2010 Category:1937 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Actors from Yorkshire Category:Deaths from vascular dementia Category:Disease-related deaths in England Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English television writers Category:Writers from Yorkshire
